name: delivery-system
description: Sistema de delivery com frontend cliente, admin e backend

scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev:backend" "npm run dev:client" "npm run dev:admin"
scripts.build: npm run build:client && npm run build:admin
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd backend && npm install && cd ../frontend-client && npm install && cd ../frontend-admin && npm install
scripts.setup: npm run install:all && npm run setup:db
